name: Maya Ubud Resort & Spa
address: Jl. Gn. Sari, Peliatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: We had the best family vacation ever at Maya Resort in Bali. The personnel really went above and above to make us feel welcome. The meal at The River Cafe was excellent, and the scenery was breathtaking. The stunning scenery and first-rate service of the resort created an experience we will never forget. Strongly advised for families looking for luxury and leisure!
review 2: Maya Ubud Spa and resort is a tranquil place amidst pristine forest, flowing rivers, long walks alongside lush green lawns and beautifully thatched roofs. With a private pool  in the villa it makes for a perfect destination. The people there are very friendly and warm. The massage at the spa is sure to relax your  nerves after a long flight. For pure vegetarians food is always a concern... But juicy fruits are always at the rescue. It's a must visit for a very relaxing stay when you are at ubud.
review 3:
Absolutely incredible hotel, the views are extraordinary and the service and staff are so much better. Everyone is super friendly and welcoming. The villa with pool was fantastic with an incredible view over the rain forest. Monkeys and other wildlife were at our door step. Finally, the food was incredible 5 stars all around.

Yoga and Sadewa at the breakfast were fantastic and made us feel right at home.
review 4: We had a fantastic time at this resort. Everything was luxurious and of a high standard. The staff went above and beyond to make sure everything is like to ensure everything is high standard. The place was spotless. The staff were swift to respond to our needs and provided so many excellent services that were fantastic choices for Honey owners. We enjoyed the floating breakfast dinner at the villa. We also had the decoration for the bathtub with flowers, and that was also amazing. Overall, it was perfect, and I highly recommend it to everybody.
review 5: I have just returned from Bali, and wished to express positive feedback for Maya resort Ubud. The resort is stunning and elegant. I was delighted with a room upgrade, but more importantly the staff are outstanding. it was my birthday and much to my embarrassment many staff sang happy birthday and presented me with a birthday cake. Thankyou to all the staff which made our visit so special. Management should be proud of their teams effort and attention to gust.

name: Kandarpa Ubud Bali
address: Jl. Lobong Sari, Peliatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: Stayed there for 4 days, the staff there was excellent Everyone was so helpful and warm. The pool is always fresh and relaxing. I stayed in room 102 the room is leaking from the ceiling for it's bathroom and on top of bathroom door. When I first came in the room was humid and smelled moldy. I would recommend the upstairs room There might be less leaks and mold. Also the road to the hotel still rocky
review 2:
Avoid this place at all costs. I was really excited to stay here but the photos definitely catfished me. The hotel promised to refund me fully for my stay but have not followed through with this.
Beware that the hotel is down a 400m pitch black ‚Äòroad‚Äô (more like a gravel pathway adjacent to a stream) that a car can barely fit down. There is a building site and a dodgy looking home stay on the same road which makes it feel not safe to walk at night. I‚Äôd hate to stay here as a solo female traveler.

There‚Äôs a dog with fleas (biting its limbs and body) wandering in the lobby, bar, restaurant and playing outside with kids. It barks madly at people when they enter.

Taxi drivers struggle to find the place and you‚Äôll wait long for a gojek.

The walls of the room are paper thin and you can hear noises, such as toilets flushing and singing, above and next door and in the corridor. It feels as though animals and insects are constantly crawling around. The towels were threadbare.

The WiFi was shockingly terrible.
review 3:
1. The room is spacious, the furniture is great but the air conditioner is misplaced in the room, so you have to wait long time to feel cool in the room, hope there will be a review about it
2. The breakfast is good and enough to start your day
3. The acces to the location is need more attention regarding the light and the street
4. The service is good, the team is very well responding
review 4: Very cozy hotel, nice rooms and great service. Swimmin pool also clean and beautiful. Just u have to find it a little bit off the road. Car reaches there. Google does not show but there is a narrow lane. Take scooter from hotel only, dont goto main road by walk after sunset. All in all great experience.
review 5:
Kandarpa is a really solid hotel in Ubud. The rooms are modern, comfortable and the beds are perfect firmness. The pool is relaxing and right outside your room as all the rooms open right into the courtyard. The lobby/restaurant was a very welcome surprise, good local cuisines that hit the spot and a nice breakfast set menu.

I can‚Äôt say enough nice things about the staff too, always welcoming with a smile and willing to go the extra mile to make your stay better. Great value for a nice vacation!

name: The Hidden Paradise Ubud
address: Banjar Laplapan, Dukuh Geria, Pejeng Kawan, Kec. Tampaksiring, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80552, Indonesia
review 1: Beautiful and quiet hotel near Ubud with stunning views and grounds. The room was spacious, clean, and very comfortable, and I loved the private garden with a sitting area just outside. The staff were so kind, friendly, and helpful, especially Ode at the front desk who greeted me throughout my stay. The food at the restaurant is also delicious and there is a nice mix of local and western options. I highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Ubud. I will definitely be back.
review 2:
Stayed for 2 nights but wished i could extend forever. Hospitality is unmatched for, they organise everything for you (scooter etc). Welcomed me with a sandwich as i checked in late.
Room is wonderful, spacious, comfortable. I love the outdoor bathroom, felf like showering in the jungle. Amazed at the surroundings, the peaceful setting and lovely pool. Highly recommend staying here for an authentic experience.
review 3: Such an incredible stay, truely a hidden gem in Ubud! We would rate it 11/10 if we could, we even extended our stay by another night. We stayed in the premier room with the pool and it was absolutely amazing. Very clean and the bed was comfortable. We have been to Bali many times and this is by far the best place we have stayed, the view and location was our favourite part. The food and drinks were great, as was the spa (the Balinese massage was heavenly), and the bike rental was extremely convenient. The staff were so so attentive and kind and made this trip so special, thank you Ode, Dwi and the bar + restaurant manager (sorry we forgot your name!), and the rest of the staff. We will definitely be back next time we come to Bali ü´∂üèº‚ù§Ô∏è
review 4: Stayed here for a weekend. Place is beautiful with stunning views and sunsets! Very attentive, kind, friendly, helpful staff. Rooms are clean and they have all necessary amenities, towels, etc. Dinner at their restaurant was delicious! Breakfast is also ok. If you have never tried floating breakfast, get this experience at least once. We are definitely considering to come back here for another peaceful weekend!
review 5:
The Hidden Paradise Ubud is hidden at a quiet place. You can miss this place easily except for a small sign at the entrance which leads to a narrow driveway into the carpark of the hotel.

Because it is hard to find, The Hidden Paradise Ubud is a quiet, romantic, luxury hotel with a great view. For those who value their privacy, this is a great place to stay in. The hotel has a shuttle bus to bring the guests into town for meals, shopping, spas, other activities, etc.

The rooms are great, spacious, clean and you can find an infinity pool outside. Do take note that other guests has access to the infinity pool too and you may find them swimming outside your room. You can use the curtain to block them out of the view of your room.

They do serve dinner and other food too. The traditional balinese food served by the chef is good

name: Bubu Suite
address: F7RG+VJX, Jl. Gn. Sari, Peliatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80552, Indonesia
review 1:
We loved our stay at Bubu Suites.
It is a bit away from the centre of Ubud so it is very quiet and peaceful. Yet only a short drive with Grab or Gojek to most of the main points of interests like the market and palace.

The staff are super kind and attentive. Just small things like bringing pool towels when you are swimming in the pool and always greeting you with a smile and letting us feed the fish :)

The breakfast was delicious and they were able to accommodate both dairy and mushroom allergies. They even note these down upon check in.
review 2:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Bubu Suite in Ubud, and I must say it was an absolutely fantastic experience. From the moment we arrived to the day of departure, the staff went above and beyond to make our holiday memorable.

One of the highlights of our stay was undoubtedly the impeccable service provided by the hotel staff. Every member of the team was friendly, attentive, and genuinely committed to ensuring our comfort. Their warm hospitality created a welcoming atmosphere, making us feel like valued guests throughout our stay.

Moreover, the overall service at the hotel was exceptional. Whether it was assistance with tour recommendations, transportation arrangements, or any other request, the staff was always prompt and eager to help. Their professionalism and dedication undoubtedly contributed to the overall positive impression of the hotel.

The ambiance and decor of the hotel were also noteworthy, creating a serene and aesthetically pleasing environment that added to the overall charm of our stay.

In conclusion, our time was nothing short of a five-star experience. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a relaxing and welcoming retreat in Ubud. The combination of excellent service, delectable breakfast options, and an overall commitment to guest satisfaction makes Bubu Suite stand out as a top-notch accommodation choice in this beautiful destination. I look forward to returning in the future.
review 3:
Absolutely enjoyed our stay. Rooms are big, well furnished, airy, hardly need AC. Nice pool, beautiful territory.

My only remarks are:
- though technically you're walking distance away from Ubud centre, those 300m till the statue are hardly walkable, so if you don't rent a bike, you'll have to splurge on Grab
- bathroom floor could be cleaner

Otherwise lovely time
review 4: If you are looking for a nice, relaxing stay in Ubud, this is your place. The rooms are cozy, clean and with a nice aesthetic. The pool is very clean and beautiful, and the garden gives a very peaceful atmosphere. Food in the restaurant is also delicious!
review 5:
Really wonderful place staff trained and helpful.
But neighbours from Peliatan, Dystrykt Ubud, Gianyar, Bali 80571 just begun of main street not respected tourist and offended.  Do not recommend staying on this street

name: Aura Dormitory House Ubud
address: Jl. Gn. Sari, Peliatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: Located in Ubud , very close to many activities and beautiful places of Ubud. Super clean Dormitory a 4 sharing bunk bed room. Accommodation with Breakfast and Black coffee@ just 5$ , what more can you ask ? Best deal and well maintained property, friendly staff . The kitchen is available also , if required we can cook for ourselves also
review 2:
A really nice place to stay! I would recommend it to everyone. They provide a nice breakfast. The service is always friendly and helpful. The only concern we had was the inability to lock the shared room. It would have been great to provide a room key for each of the four beds. This was the reason why we paid extra attention to always lock our things inside the lockers.
Otherwise the location is great. You are able to get around Ubud even without a scooter.
review 3: This place delivers an amazingly good value for money. Initially stayed here for 2 nights but ended with 4 nights. It's a very quiet and relaxing place to stay around Ubud. A clean private bathroom in each room, good pancake breakfast, daily motorbike rental, and a very hospitable staff and owner. I would recommend this hostel to my friends and relatives. üëå
review 4: I love this hostel. The dormitory are very clean, my bed was so cozy, it‚Äôs a good place to socialize and there is a laundry service next to the hostel. I wish I cloud stay longer here
review 5: One of the nicest Hostel I‚Äôve stayed. Really lovely Stuff, nice Rooms and very good money value. The free Pancaces for breakfast are the best!

name: Kalos Bali
address: Jl. Gn. Sari, Peliatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: The place has a spacious outdoor area, it was quite breezy since it‚Äôs surrounded by many trees. Seems cozy since we saw many people working there in the morning. We opted to dine in their indoor area instead. The food was great and the staff were friendly and helpful.
review 2: I discovered this restaurant on Google, and their menu piqued my interest. It's a welcoming place with a friendly staff. The food was excellent! We had tacos, salad, and grilled marinated chicken, all served with an aperol spritz.
review 3:
Incredible place with good interior design and one of the best coffee with soya milk‚òïÔ∏è
I highly recommended this cafe for digital nomad, who need space for work. There have wild tables with socket and laptop zoneüåøüíª
review 4: Thanks to Erna, Dayu & Susan for making my husband's birthday brunch feel so special. We've been coming to Kalos all week for dinner and today we tried their breakfast. Every meal we've had has been delicious and service always outstanding. We highly recommend the Banana and Peanut Butter Milkshake. It was incredible! If there is one place you must go when in Bali it's this place.
review 5: Food was exactly what I was after. Having live easy listening music in the background whilst enjoying some food and a wine was well worth the 3min walk from our villa

name: Sekembang Ubud Villa
address: F7QG+X72, Jl. Gn. Sari, Peliatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: Stayed here for 2 nights. Nice place to stay. Super clean and big room. Bli Gunawan and family were very nice and helpful, the dog was also very friendly. Will definitely come back again soon.
review 2: The place is really beautiful. And the hostess is amazing person and very humble. The rooms are very very neat and so was the pool. They have their own scooter rental, and the place is nearby to most of the services.
review 3:
We couple stayed here for 2 nights. 16 amd 17 july 2023 .

No one can find a single difference between photo and actual rooms.

Such a nice vibes is there in the room.

Wifi worked very well .  Swimming pool is also very nice and crystal clean.

Most importantly the behaviors of the whole staffs was very much adorable  and appreciated.

Shared kitchen with refrigerator available.

We rented scooter for 2 days from you.

I am very much satiafied with your all service

I wish villa sakembang ubud villa and its staffs  a great  success in life.
Thank you once again
review 4:
Beautiful little homestay for a small price! The location is perfect to be out of busy town, but still being able to get there within 10 mins. There's a few nice restaurants nearby too.

Also a small dog, which was always happy to see us :) 10/10
review 5:
Beautiful honestay ‚ô° really comfy, quiet and relaxing place , ideal to be away of the hectic center but still close by two streets of distance.

I loved the little puppy that they had, always happy to cuddle, the respect for the nature, very very friendly staff‚ô°‚ô°

If i come back to Ubud i Will come back ‚ô° thankyou !

name: Cahaya Indah Villas Ubud
address: Banjar Sala, Pejeng Kawan, Kec. Tampaksiring, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80552, Indonesia
review 1:
Very beautiful, modern, luxurious private villa. Only down side was shower pressure was terrible as it was very weak in room 4 and it would spontaneously go from very hot to cold during use.
Only 1 room key card so villa would get very hot if you left for and came back.
review 2:
The Villa is very private, with luxurious gardens leading you your sanctuary.
Gorgeous outlook onto the private infinity pool adds to the feel.
Tari, Wili, Ni Luh and Ketut made our stay very special. Thank you.
You must try the floating breakfast.
review 3: We stayed at villa Sakura and our friends hat the other villas next to it. Communication before arrival was excellent, they also organized a pick up and scooter for us. Anything we needed we just texted via whatsapp. Easy check in and easy check out. Very nice location in the middle of the jungle - the view is stunning!! And very private and quiet. Just a few minutes away by scooter from Ubud center with all restaurants. The bed was super comfy and the shower and bathroom is just huge!! We truely enjoyed our stay. The infinity pool was a big plus!!
review 4: Amazing view and luxury villas, clean and quiet, of you are looking for romantic,private, and quiet holiday this is the right place, staff are very friendly and supportive, prices are affordable, spa services is good as well
review 5: Beautiful spot, far enough out of the hustle and bustle but only a short Grab ride away from Ubud.

name: Puri Suksma Ubud
address: Jalan Gunung Sari, Desa Peliatan, Ubud, Peliatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
Really great stay , staff were so helpful. I fell poorly and they couldn‚Äôt do enough to help me. The rooms were spacious and beds were huge, pool and gardens kept great. Fried noodles were a massive hit. As a group of 19 we couldn‚Äôt complain, they made signs for my brothers birthday and a cake!  They didn‚Äôt moan about noise or mess or anything for that matter. They even dropped us to our next accommodation, picked me up from the medical centre, brought food to our room for me. The nicest people I have ever met for the price you pay you get a quality service. Rooms were clean. Ade and her family were great. Would reccomend defo!!
Can‚Äôt forget the very very cute house dog chico who was a huge hit with all of us!
Made sure breakfast was ready for our early starts and day trips which was also very kind.
Thankyou so so much!
review 2:
Peaceful low key property with kind hosts and beautiful views.

I came to Bali for 1 month for a yoga  certification and we stayed on this property, did yoga at their yoga shala and ate food here every day.

Pros:
1. Good food. Because of our training, we had breakfast ,  lunch and dinner here. good variety and taste.

2. This is a FAMILY owned and operated property. Adi and her family live on site and are available 24/7 for your needs. We had a yoga member have a health condition during our stay, and Adi arranged everything for us to get to hospital , where to go and what to do. Hardworking kind family.

3. They clean every day. Every day we had our bed made (sheets washed whenever requested too), floors swept and mopped, and bathroom cleaned. I saw them clean and filter pool every morning too.

4. The price! Very reasonable price, especially for long term.

5. The animals! They have the sweetest dog and kitten family on property. Don‚Äôt worry if you aren‚Äôt an animal person, they don‚Äôt bother you at all. But if you are, you can play with them all day. For a whole month I really missed my dog back at home, so I was so grateful for this experience.

6. Laundry options! Very cheap to do laundry , they wash and fold for you , and there is a hand wash option too

7. Yoga shala! Two beautiful yoga shalas available for your own practice and they also offer yoga classes. Surrounded by the jungle, it is so peaceful.

8. Quiet! It‚Äôs very quiet and low key here. Not a lot of traffic or noise. Perfect for your peace.

9. Good WiFi and signal. This was an essential while I needed to work remote.

Cons
1. It is not the MOST updated. But honestly I think that is reflected in the price.

All of the people writing bad reviews must have expected some kind of 5 star hotel. If you are looking for a 5 star hotel experience , then go book something $200+/night.
But if you are looking for a safe, peaceful, traditional Balinese experience, then stay here at Puri Suksma
review 3:
The most disappointing and disgusting hotel I ever visited.  No one should stay at this property. We pay way higher then what we get and the reception straight refused to give what we booked even we are not happy at all what they offered to us and took all of our money in advance fully in cash.

The room we booked was fully equipped and well furnished. The room we got was completely empty, broken and not clean. No cover on duvet, shower was broken, sink was broken, toilet seat was so so dirty, floor was disgusting, just 2 lights on the roof but very dim . The room as completely abandoned and after saying so many times that the rooms we don‚Äôt like, they just ignored us and we left no option to stay.

Water, slipper, shower gel, everything was missing and we have to ask again and again until it arrived .

At the breakfast our food and drinks just thrown on table and given one piece one bread and one omelette. When we asked for pancakes they said they‚Äôll not give us as we don‚Äôt stay longer !! we booked for 6nights I don‚Äôt know how long they was us to stay just for one pancake ??

The don‚Äôt care about their guests at all and on the first day in the breakfast they already mentioned to us that we should check out at 11am if we are without we even asked.

Took the full money in cash, didn‚Äôt treat us as a guests how it should be taken care and also telling us to leave if we don‚Äôt like so they can sell our room to different people and earn more!! It‚Äôs totally scam and should be closed this property.  They even placed us No show from there systems show we can‚Äôt report after the check out process.  We also have file a complaint in booking (dot)com . But I‚Äôm not sure if they take any action against it.
review 4: We lived here for over two months and were satisfied.  The owners are very nice, good people.  The area is spacious and clean.  There is a large swimming pool which is cleaned every day.  The rooms themselves are small but cozy.  A huge plus is that you can order food from the owners, it is very profitable and very tasty.  I recommend to everyone.  If we are in Bali again, we will definitely stay there.
review 5:
Here‚Äôs to type of room view
- 1st room view with pool
- 2end room view on garden which is very scary ,
So I booked this hotel 4 months ago with the room with view on pool but when I arrived the staff send me to the garden room which is I didn‚Äôt accept to stay there so they called the owner and talked to her actually the owner are very rude and she didn‚Äôt apologize for what happened she just yelled at me and said If you don‚Äôt want cancel!
dirty toilet the smell is really disgusting, no shampoo no soap.
I asked the staff when we can swim because there‚Äôs a constructions on the pool he said probably takes 2 weeks- 1 month

name: Umah Dangin Guest House
address: Jl Gunung Sari Gang Wana Sara Banjar Ambengan Peliatan, Peliatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Ubud Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
This is such a lovely guesthouse! The atmosphere is peaceful, the pool is clean and the rooms get a nice breeze in the afternoons.

But, the most amazing part about staying here is the family who runs the guesthouse. They are good people and will go out of their way to help you.

We will be back soon!
review 2: This guest house is simply beautiful, the pool is clean and in the sun most of the day. The rooms are spacious and clean, just 4 rooms here gives the guesthouse a friendly family feel and the hosts are so friendly and accommodating and always present to help. Our host was even nice enough to take us to the airport for an initial price that‚Äôs way better than any taxi you will try to get. This place is perfect for a lovely stay in ubud!
review 3:
I actually chose not to stay at this property. I went to check it out and no one was at the front desk area. The ground aren't as nice as photographed. To me it looked like college dorm house.

The pool was not sparkling clean as posted in the listing. I didn't just the sense I would be in relaxation mode there based on the presentation. I could be wrong.
review 4:
Whereeeeee
To even start

The family:
Most kind, generous ,  funny, welcoming pleasent you ever meet in your life.

The moment you walk in you're part of

WIFI GOD BLESS YOU Umah Danging.

You're amazing keep being the way you areeee

Hoo and the rooms are great! Comohy bed

Good wifi

I repeat Good wifi üëç üì∂

Your just 1 min drive from the city ..

And I'll tell you what it's the best area
review 5: Really nice experience, I've stay for 3 nights, good swimming pool, good rooms, and people really nice. There is a location of scooters just next to and a wonderful restaurant down the street.

name: Jero Karang Negara
address: F7RG+J6M, Peliatan, Ubud, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: Booked a 3 day stay here via Airbnb. Have to say the stay was very pleasant. Good bed, nice bathroom, swimming pool and Alan was a good host. Definitely would recommend.
review 2: Very wonderful place but teenagers from this street do not respect foreigners at all. I will not recommend to stay In this neighbourhood.
review 3: Peaceful and amazing place ! Clean swimming pool and rooms, free fruits and nice kitchen!

name: Warung Abian Ubud Kitchen & Coffee
address: Jl. Gn. Sari, Peliatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: Hidden gem for food and drinks. The cocktails are really good for the price. The price is cheap for cocktails 20-30K. The food is okay. But the location is beautiful, calm, in the middle of the rice field. Accessible by car/motorbike. 5 minutes from ubud Centre. Will come back for the surrounding and cocktails.
review 2: Hidden in the ricefields. A nice easy restaurant. Place to hang out with a drink. Many food options well priced. Hidden gem. 100% recommend
review 3:
A really good place - the road is a bit tricky, not for a car ride, but it was worth it.
The view is beautiful,  the food is good, the prices are very reasonable.
review 4: What an awesome place! The food and drinks were fantastic. The Staff is friendly and the location ist just beautiful! I would definitely recommend it - especially for sunset üòä
review 5: A hidden gem not far from Ubud downtown. Cozy and seems perfect if someone wants to bring your work stuffs to enjoy the view, coffees and drinks variety.

name: Stranded Villas Ubud
address: Gianyar, Pejeng Kawan, Kec. Tampaksiring, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80552, Indonesia
review 1:
üçÉüçÉüçÉ
We spent a wonderful immersive time in a secluded spot in Ubud.
üçÉThis villa is out of the world. It's a slice of Balinese paradise a few minutes' drive from the city's hustle bustle.
üçÉit has an infinite pool with jungle views.
üçÉ5 staff members are always checking on your needs for meals, chauffeur, massage, and other things üôè
üçÉüçÉüçÉ
review 2: We have just spent three memorable days at this wonderful property. Beautiful village, superb location and then the actual buildings themselves... spacious, stylishly appointed rooms and utterly, utterly serene. The staff are incredibly helpful and discreet the breakfasts are delicious and the staff will cook for you on request very fresh, flavoursome ingredients. It was very difficult to leave. Anyone choosing this villa from a website will be very fortunate and we will recommend widely!
review 3: Very beautiful property, the owner has great taste in decorating it. Beautiful view. Lovely and very helpful staff.
review 4:
Beautiful place.
Authentic Minimalist Confortable Natural Elegant Peaceful
ü¶úüêæü¶ãüêí
review 5: I lived here for a week and found that it was really good

name: Pemulan House & Resto
address: Jl. Gn. Sari, Peliatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: Amazing place to stay,awesome bar and restaurant,great view and luxurious round nature,love it so much ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
review 2:
I stayed at Pemulan house for 1 month, it is a very nice place, the staff was very nice, they have 4 lovely bungalows that have a view on the garden. The restaurant /bar is also very good,we ordered many times there, it‚Äôs top notch food really! You can also ask to have the food at your bungalows or by the pool. The place was cleaned everyday, I definitely recommend it. Location is also very good.
If you are not staying there you can come to enjoy the restaurant and the pool.
Special thanks to the team that was always making sure we are having a perfect stay!
review 3: We stayed at Pemulan House for 4 nights. The service was incredible, every meal we had was delicious and overall the ambiance was great. Because it is outside of the city center, it was quiet at night - just the sounds of nature and the occasional rooster. We had no problem walking to the city center.
review 4: We stayed at Pemulan House for 3 days and ate regularly at their restaurant. The continental breakfast (with banana pancakes) was amazing! Nice prices too! Really recommend to come here, the staff is very nice and kind. You can even swim in their beautiful pool!
review 5:
lovely quiet atmosphere & wonderful food - we shared some spring rolls, an aglio pasta & a super tasty chicken soup.

The soft acoustic music was peaceful & pool was a big bonus that we enjoyed dipping our feet in! We‚Äôll definitely be back.

Terima kasih banyak Pemulan ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: Pondok Tropical Guest House
address: Jl. Gn. Sari Gang Uma Abian Kelod, Peliatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: Made and Putu's home was really lovely and peaceful. Despite only staying for 1 night, they made it really comfortable and smooth. The walk to the house was paved well and seeing the rice fields especially in the morning and evening really puts a smile to my face at how serene the place is. Their son, Yana, is a wonderful tour guide and has the best recommendations. They helped to organise an airport pick up and tour for me all in a day. Yana also sent me to my new place the next day. They are all very friendly and approachable. You'll definitely love your stay with them :)
review 2: Quite simply the best place I've stayed in Asia.  Its a dramatically beautiful mansion/house set in the ricefields.  Peaceful, quiet like you are in a village but you are actually only a couple minutes from Ubud centre.  Gym right next door, wonderful restaurants a 1min walk.  Super lovely hosts.  Quality treatments at the in-house spa.  Amazing breakfast options.  Madee and his family are just the best of people, generous, decent, reliable.  Pricing is extremely affordable for what it was.
review 3:
The guest house I stayed at was nothing short of amazing and I cannot speak highly enough of it. Made and Putu were fantastic hosts and were extremely polite and helpful. A five or ten minute walk to the main road, but I wasn't bothered by that. You get to enjoy the view of the rice fields while you're there. There was a clear view of the rice field from my room, which was refreshing in the morning. It's only about a 10 minute ride to Ubud center on gojek, so it's convenient to many places.

Here are some pros:
- My room was spacious and clean, and my host made it up on the 2nd day, which I appreciated
- The air conditioning works great
- The toilets are clean and spacious.
- There's an aqua bottle in the room
- Breakfast can be served for a little fee

Cons of the room (for fussy travellers):
- The wifi connection is intermittent
- I couldn't get hot water for the shower

Thanks to Ajik and Yana for picking me up from the airport and also for taking me to my hotel in Canggu, I especially appreciate it.

Overall, I had a great experience staying at the guest house, and I will definitely recommend it to others and recommend it to friends.
review 4: I stayed here for 2,5 month and just as last summer I loved every minute of it! Made, Putu and their children are so kind and helpful üôè It‚Äôs a quiet place with a spa in the garden and plenty of restaurants nearby! You can watch the farmers work their land, witnessed by eagrets and other birds. All in walking distance from Ubud center.
review 5: I really loved this place! It's a perfect little retreat away from the busy Ubud centre. Its tucked away amongst the rice fields. The rooms have amazing views of the ricefield too. Very peaceful. The room I had was huge, fit for a queen! It was clean, comfortable & breakfast was brought to my room every morning, which was very simple but oh so tasty. The hosts were very lovely & friendly. I would recommend to bring a torch if planning to go out in the evening, when coming &/or going at night time. I loved it so much I extended my stay.

name: Sawitri Anandhita luxury villas
address: Br Dukuh Kawan No.24B, Pejeng Kawan, Kec. Tampaksiring, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80552, Indonesia
review 1:
If I could give it 10 stars, I would. Now, I understand why it's highly rated.

My spouse and I stayed here for only 2 days because we had already pre-booked a different place, but we wished we had booked longer.

This is truly a hidden gem and worth every penny. Arga and her partner welcomed us at 11:30 pm on the day we arrived and helped us settle in. We received 5-star hotel service at the price of a 3-star accommodation. Arga was always on standby to answer any of our questions, and her team ensured our breakfast and other requests were attended to promptly.

The attention to detail in the place is remarkable; it‚Äôs very zen and relaxing. We will definitely be returning here with other friends.

The villa features a large welcoming room with a kitchen, a master bedroom with two sitting areas, and a spacious shower area with a bathtub. Next door is a similar villa, allowing large families or two couples to book a holiday next to each other.

The privacy in both villas is exceptional; you could even go skinny dipping if you wanted to üòÖ
review 2:
Staying at this exquisite villa in Ubud was an absolute delight! From the moment we arrived, the warmth of the staff and their exceptional service made us feel right at home. Each morning, we were treated to a breakfast that was not just delicious but a culinary masterpiece‚Äîa perfect start to our days exploring Bali. The villa itself was a serene oasis, beautifully designed and maintained, offering us a peaceful retreat in the heart of Ubud. The hospitality was beyond compare, making our entire stay an unforgettable experience.
I would definitely stay when I come to Bali again and recommend others to choose this villa if coming to Ubud Bali.
Memorable stay
review 3: It was most welcoming villa to stay, the owner(Ms Arga and Mr Made) was very accommodating Owner. The hospitality was great. Definitely will come again.
review 4: Absolutely amazing place to stay. Very nice and organised host that went above and beyond for our anniversary but organising some amazing surprises. Private pool, cool aircon and comfortable bed are only a small part of how fantastic it was. Thankyou.
review 5:
Great Experienced to stay in Sawitri Luxury Villas üòò
Nice place, clean, new brand, big area, quite and peace with friendly Staff
They provide All toiletries
The breakfast menu also good üòç
Its lovely isn't it
I would love to come and stay again
My boy love the pool
So, Highly Reccomended this villa for couple of Family üëçüèª

name: Tree Bar at Maya Ubud
address: Jl. Gn. Sari, Peliatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: Stunning grounds.  The food is okay, but worth it to see the views here. Honestly one of the most beautiful hotels I‚Äôve ever seen. They also have great spa treatments. Their flower baths have a view of the river! You can also walk out back and see a beautiful rice field.  At nights they have a band playing in the dining area.  Greta place for a date.
review 2:
This is the secondary dining option at the hotel, the drinks terrace seating is lovely as are the tables overlooking the valley. The sangria here is singular, very tasty and rich. Though everything was tasty and the portions were not small, the flavors are very good but not out of this world.

The service was prompt and the atmosphere is calm, tables well spaced.

We had the beetroot salad, smash burger and the spring rolls. Everything was tasty and filling; a nice place with varied, tasty food options.
review 3: Once I had been coming here several times a month (before the pandemic), then I had to move back to Europe and recently I came back after nearly three years of break. The place is wonderful, looks great. The coffee is very tasty, the food is really yummy, drinks and serving look great. I'd come here to eat more often if I didnt live over an hour drive away. The only down side is that many of the staff seem to have trouble communicating in English, although on one hand it is Indonesia and they have their own language, but on the other hand it is an international establishment so it is well expected that guests won't know local language. Am I right?
review 4: I really enjoyed my dining experience here - the food was very good but even better was the friendly service from: Arsana, Ayu, Dek Rika, Mely, and Sanji.  Thank you team for being so helpful and friendly
review 5: This is a really nice place to have a drink or eat , the view is amazing, Parka and Dewi are some really good guests!!

name: Mayasari Restaurant
address: Jl. Gn. Sari, Peliatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
The breakfast buffet was amazing and very extensive. My boyfriend mentioned it was his birthday and they prepared the cake and the entire team sang. It was very sweet.

Sutrisna and everyone were super friendly and attentive. The resort is beautifully also. We would definitely come back and stay there next time.
review 2: We have had breakfast at this place on many occasions and the food has always been amazing with a wide range of options to choose from. There is something to suit every taste. We absolutely loved our experience here. Sutrisna and his team, including Krisna, Bayu, and many other servers, went above and beyond to ensure that we were enjoying our time and had everything we needed.
review 3:
I had breakfast for two days.
My mom and aunt who went with me said the desserts were so delicious and liked them
The buburinjin menu is so good.
I'm so satisfied Especially manager dewi, you are so kind and caring.
Thank you for the food.
review 4: The food, especially the Ikan Bakar Timbaran, was absolutely delicious, and we received excellent service from Parka and Hartini. The saxophone live-brand is awesome. We will definitely be returning again soon. Thank you!
review 5: The food was very nice and looks very good. Atmosphere is very friendly with music playing and the staff, Parka and Dalam were very helpful.

name: The Aruna House Ubud - Bali
address: Jl. Gn. Sari, Peliatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80552, Indonesia
review 1:
Lovely Villa with two cottages and a common swimming pool. As we were using both the cottages, we had the place exclusively to ourselves. It was 3 days and nights of superb stay.
The couple looking after the place was outstanding in the service provided. We really enjoyed our stay.
However, this is not very convenient for senior citizens, especially people with walking or climbing issues, so they should avoid.
review 2:
Friendly & nicest hosts. Clean room & proper breakfast. Swimming pool could be a bit cleaner. Quite close to the city center however a bit hidden. Love the hospitality.
Room was great, clean & proper amenities! Aircon was in good condition. However the TV & swimming pool could be improved
review 3: we have the best experiences in this hotel. The villa was lovely, comfortable and with everything we needed. The staff was very attentive and friendly, the pay a lot of attention to details and they help us with everything
review 4: They have good hospitality here. The staff are so nice and helpful. Although, there is one water heater and the bath tub is not working. The way to go here is a little tricky where you have to go through a narrow road that only fits by one car.
review 5: Best place in the world ! Very clean room, nice hosts i will be missing for this.. :)

name: WBC Warung Batan Cempaka
address: Jl. Gn. Sari, Peliatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80552, Indonesia
review 1: I never leave reviews but felt I had to for this venue. The quality of the food and service is absolutely exceptional for a price that beggars belief. 3 dishes and 3 drinks for under 120k. This really is a hidden gem in Ubud. Do not miss dining here!
review 2: The best food on the entire island, and we tried in many pubs, nowhere will you find such good nasi goreng or delicious mie kuah soup. Additionally, there is a nice atmosphere in the warung, the service is at the highest level, nice and smiling. worth a visit!
review 3: I ate the food before I could snap a pic but I had to leave a review. I‚Äôve been eating LOTS of warungs in the last 6 months being in bali + Lombok and wow this one was top tier. Excellent flavor. Provided also chicken satay and sambal. Very elevated dish for the same price as other warungs. The establishment is also very nice. I‚Äôll be back for sure - glad I found this gem !!
review 4:
We went there twice cause the first time we were very happy with the food quality, servicios and price.
India was amazing and friendly. Food was served quick and was delicious.
I will come back next time I am in Ubud.
review 5: Just come here and try, you will definitely enjoy this place
